entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
